outputs.output_descr:
This EU/FMO support to the Government of St. Vincent funded assistance will include training and other CARTAC technical assistance areas earmarked and prioritized by the Government of St. Vincent and the Grenadines, following the March 2009 assessment mission. This EU/FMO assistance will be implemented by the Ministry of Finance which has direct oversight for Public Finance Management (PFM) and related PEFA programme components. These include:

• A Public Finance Management (PFM) Reform Programme which is in line with the requirements of the FMO. This PFM programme was formulated with an Act
